content: this playful fuzzy bicolor swirl framed into a granny square offers endless opportunities for combining colors and sizing the chunky yarn with contrasting fur spirals is super quick to make and ideal for snuggling up near the fireplace on chilly winter nights mix holiday colors for a festive mood or stick to a classical neutral combo for striking modern décor and assemble a custom blanket to your liking quick and easy this blanket will make a perfect gift
